parry.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to defend yourself against someone who is attacking you by pushing their weapon or hand to one side
parry.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: It is far easier to parry a direct blow than to stop it forcibly.
parry.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to avoid answering a question that is difficult to answer or that someone does not want to answer
parry.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: He parried all her questions about his work.
